page.title: 10SHILDON COUNTY LIBRARY
page.content: The{County library}is in the town centre{over a mile away from where I } {live.}It is housed in a{new building } completed 3 years ago.When you go into the library you need your 3 orange tickets which have your name and address on them. I go onto the children's section where there are books for younger readers.On the tops of the shelves are labels to tell you what sort of books are there. To join the library you have to complete a pink form and take it home for your parents to sign.When you have returned this you then get your 3 tickets.Afteryou have chosen the books you want(max.3)the librarian stamps the book to show the date by which the book must be returned,takes one of your tickets for each book,and keeps this with a slip from the book.If you do not return the book you pay a fine.
